title: Conserved quantities in collision disk and rod

content.question:
A disk sliding on a horizontal surface that has negligible friction collides with a rod that is free to move and rotate on the surface, as shown in the top view above. Which of the following quantities must be the same for the disk-rod system before and after the collision?

Linear momentum

Angular momentum

Kinetic energy

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
